name: Pirates Chase: kill or Capture the sea smugglers
name_original: Pirates Chase: kill or Capture the sea smugglers
description:
The pirates are smuggling some very important items out of the country which they have stolen from government enterprises. your job is to stop them and recover the stolen goods. The pirates are heavily armed to fight you back but you have the latest armory to kill them all and stop them running out our countries oceanic limits.
On each level you will be given a specific goal. you have to stop the pirates and kill them all before they kill you. you will be provided will full equipped helicopter with a team of professsionals
Features
* Exceptionally realistic graphics
* Latest A.I
* Heavy armory
* Fully equipped helicopter/chopper
